entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Hart Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 09:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: NW 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight except rain along parts of the coast. Snowfall amount 2 cm except rainfall amount 2 mm along the coast. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Rain along parts of the coast early in the morning. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm inland. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
